reviewText: I very much enjoyed Rasta Man From Zion. It was a special treat as I was blessed to view it together with my 12 year old daughter. I was not much older than her when I first met Isaac and his lovely wife Carol,They continue to share that positive vibration through the generations. Isaac is the real deal,I Highly recommend  Rasta Man From Zion.
This is a DVD about one of the GREATEST and MOST HUMBLE people I have ever had the pleasure of knowing.  We all can learn a lot from him.  I have nothing but RASpect for this man!
